answers.answer: About 3 months ago I had gross blood in my urine that went away entirely after a few evacuations.  It was associated with pain.  I have had many tests including the one where they look up there and they have found nothing abnormal.  There is still a slight irritation.  The general idea I get from specialists is that I likely ruptured a blood vessel.  How and why is a mystery though.  This urinary tract is full of mysteries I'm finding.  My advice is to drink enough so that the urine isn't too concentrated and to leave that area alone for a good while (3-5 weeks).No worries, the body has a tendency to want to heal itself.
Also, I have found that it is difficult to get in to see a urologist.  If he experiences more blood or heightened pain, be firm in scheduling an appointment with a specialist.
